name: COKE
description: The world-famous cola with a perfect balance of sweet and fizzy flavors.

name: COKE ZERO
description: Zero-calorie cola offering the classic Coke taste without the sugar.

name: DUTCH LADY
description: A popular dairy brand known for milk, flavored milk, and other dairy products. It emphasizes nutrition and quality, often targeted at families and children.

name: NESCAFE
description: Instant coffee with a rich aroma and smooth flavor for coffee lovers on the go.

name: 100 PLUS
description: A popular isotonic drink to rehydrate and refresh after physical activity.

name: SPRITE
description: Lemon-lime flavored soda with a crisp, clean, and refreshing taste.

name: A&W
description: Creamy and smooth root beer with a rich, nostalgic flavor.

name: FANTA GRAPE
description: Grape-flavored soda bursting with sweet and tangy flavors.

name: FANTA ORANGE
description: Classic orange soda with a bright, citrusy flavor.

name: Mountain dew
description: A citrus-flavored carbonated soft drink known for its high caffeine content and energetic, bold branding. Popular among young adults and gamers.

name: 7 UP
description: A lemon-lime flavored, caffeine-free soft drink. Known for its crisp, refreshing taste and often marketed as a lighter, uplifting beverage.
